title: A high-net-worth money manager details a 2-part investing strategy that combines conservative stock investing with opportunistic dip-buying
full_text: A high-net-worth money manager details a 2-part investing strategy that combines conservative stock investing with opportunistic dip-buying. Investing pros say don't try to time the stock market. This wealth manager's strategy let's you do it smartly.. It's advice you hear time and again from investing pros: Don't try to time the stock market. No one knows when the market's going to drop, by how much, and how long a recovery will take. Instead, in… [+4580 chars]
